languages.text: Старейшины Детей Искупления с Гордости Сантиэля молят о помощи — некое безжалостное чудовише охотится на выживших в недрах улья, не позволяя покинуть убежища.

traits.locale_text: Старейшины Детей Искупления молят о помощи — безжалостный Погонщик Кошмаров охотится на выживших в недрах улья, не позволяя покинуть убежища.

languages.text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.
languages.original_text: Старейшины Детей Искупления с Гордости Сантиэля молят о помощи — некое безжалостное чудовише охотится на выживших в недрах улья, не позволяя покинуть убежища.

traits.locale_text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.
The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.
The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.
The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.

languages.text: 在桑提尔之傲，“救赎之子”的长老正在恳求帮助。一头残暴的怪物正在巢都深处猎杀幸存者，幸存者无法离开藏身之处。
languages.original_text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.

traits.locale_text: 在桑提尔之傲，“救赎之子”的长老正在恳求帮助。一头残暴的怪物正在巢都深处猎杀幸存者，幸存者无法离开藏身之处。

languages.text: サンティエル・プライドからやって来たチルドレン・オブ・リデンプションの長老たちが助けを求めている。無慈悲な獣がハイヴの奥で生き残った者たちを狩っているため、彼らは避難している場所から逃げることができずにいる。
languages.original_text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.

traits.locale_text: サンティエル・プライドからやって来たチルドレン・オブ・リデンプションの長老たちが助けを求めている。無慈悲な獣がハイヴの奥で生き残った者たちを狩っているため、彼らは避難している場所から逃げることができずにいる。

languages.text: Los ancianos de los Hijos de la Redención de Orgullo de Santiel suplican auxilio: una cruel bestia está dando caza a los supervivientes en las profundidades de la colmena, lo que les impide abandonar el refugio.
languages.original_text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.

traits.locale_text: Los ancianos de los Hijos de la Redención de Orgullo de Santiel suplican auxilio: una cruel bestia está dando caza a los supervivientes en las profundidades de la colmena, lo que les impide abandonar el refugio.

languages.text: Die Ältesten der Kinder der Erlösung von Santiels Stolz bitten dich um Hilfe – eine gnadenlose Bestie macht in den Tiefen der Makropole Jagd auf Überlebende, um ihre Flucht zu verhindern.
languages.original_text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.

traits.locale_text: Die Ältesten der Kinder der Erlösung von Santiels Stolz bitten dich um Hilfe – eine gnadenlose Bestie macht in den Tiefen der Makropole Jagd auf Überlebende, um ihre Flucht zu verhindern.

languages.text: Les aînés des Enfants de la Rédemption de la Gloire de Santiel implorent votre aide : une créature impitoyable traque les survivants dans les profondeurs de la ruche, les empêchant de quitter le refuge.
languages.original_text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.

traits.locale_text: Les aînés des Enfants de la Rédemption de la Gloire de Santiel implorent votre aide : une créature impitoyable traque les survivants dans les profondeurs de la ruche, les empêchant de quitter le refuge.

languages.text: Santiel'in Gururu'ndaki Kefaretin Çocukları'nın büyükleri, yardım talep ediyor. Kovanın derinliklerinde hayatta kalanları avlayan acımasız bir yaratık, onları sığınağı terk etmekten alıkoyuyormuş.
languages.original_text: The elders of the Children of Redemption from Santiel's Pride are pleading for help — a merciless beast is hunting survivors in the depths of the hive, stopping them from leaving the refuge.

traits.locale_text: Santiel'in Gururu'ndaki Kefaretin Çocukları'nın büyükleri yardım talep ediyor. Kovanın derinliklerinde hayatta kalanları avlayan acımasız bir yaratık varmış ve onları sığınağı terk etmekten alıkoyuyormuş.
